text: Yena Unalele kuphela ukuba nidle into ezifeleyo, igazi, inyama yehagu, nasiphi na isilwanyana esixhelelwe ukuba lidini lomnikelo kwenye into engenguYe uAllâh. Kodwa ke ukuba ubani uye wanyanzeliswa yimeko enganyamezelekiyo, engenziwa yindelelo, engaqhutywa lugabadelo ke kaloku uAllâh nguMxoleli, uSozinceba
